In line with Covid-19 rules, the Royal British Legion are encouraging people to still take part in a moment of Remembrance by observing the 2 Minute Silence at 11am from their doorstep today. November 11, 2020, Armistice day, marks 102 years since the end of the War.
COVID-19 TESTING: More dates and times have been added!

Despite the lockdown we can still come together and honour the service and sacrifice of all those who have served in the Armed Forces. Join us, and the nation, in the #TwoMinuteSilence from your doorstep at 11am this morning.
